clean_data: Network Security Engineer span lNetworkspan Security Engineer Network Engineer Fremont CA Individual with 3 years of professional experience as a Network Engineer and someone who is optimistic in nature with a great character looking for Network Engineer position Extensive experience in designing maintaining monitoring securing the networks with a great client supporting and troubleshooting skills Authorized to work in the US for any employer Work Experience Network Security Engineer ANTHEM INC Wallingford CT July 2017 to January 2018 Roles Responsibilities Implemented security policies security profiles and managing and optimizing the rules on Checkpoint Palo Alto Cisco ASA firewalls Configured policies on Palo Alto firewalls and extensive experience working with PANORAMA management console URL filtering Antivirus Anti Spyware Experienced working with Checkpoint firewalls ie creating rules and installing the rules to the firewalls using management server Experienced working with R76 R77 R80 Gaia Experienced working with URL filtering IPSIDS filtering AntiVirus and Anti Spyware in Palo Alto Checkpoint and Cisco ASA firewalls to prevent the networks from malware trojans and preventing the users from accessing unwanted sites based on the company policies Implemented SiteSiteIPSEC Remote and DMVPN in different firewalls Extensive experience working with TCPDUMP FWMONITOR for capturing the traffic flow and using it in troubleshooting and monitoring the networks Performed vulnerability scan reports using SUSSEN tool Performed URL filtering and content filtering by adding policies in Bluecoat proxy Had experience using different tools and technologies like FIREMON TUFIN SPLUNK for optimizing auditing and reporting firewalls usage Experienced working with Wireshark and Solarwinds for monitoring and managing the networks Great knowledge and handson experience working with Palo Alto 5k 7k Checkpoint R77 R80 Gaia Cisco ASA 5520 5540 5550 series firewalls Worked with different models of routers 1800 2500 2600 3500 3600 7200 and switches 2900 2960 3560 4500 6500 Network Administrator OSI CONSULTING Hyderabad Telangana June 2013 to December 2015 Roles Responsibilities Experienced working with OSPF using features like TSA SA NSSA and route summarization Organized EBGPIBGP rules also implemented BGP attributes such as Local preference MED ASPATH Prepend Community and Weight Experience in configuring EIGRP OSPF and BGP Experience working with Remedy ticketing tool in creating managing and troubleshooting the tickets and provided technical support to clients in network related issues using mails and telephonic calls Great experience working with different switching and routing technologies like configuring VLANs trunking using 8021Q ISL VTP modes IOS upgradation node additions deletions and configuring and addingreplacing switches and routers in the existing network Experience working with MS VISIO for creating lowlevel network diagrams Documenting the changes and modifications in the network using ITIL management Experience working with Windows servers Active Directory to provide access to users ie adding users and groups and managing the group policy objects GPOs and VMware vSphere ESXi vCenter server for creating deploying virtual servers Experience in creating VMware templates creating snapshots and cloning of virtual servers for future deployments in notime and experience in using advanced features such as HA DRS Faulttolerance Education MASTER of SCIENCE in COMPUTER SCIENCE in Wireless Mobile Communications Kent State University BACHELOR of SCIENCE IN ELECTRONICS COMMUNICATION ENGINEERING in Communication Networks Jawaharlal Nehru Technological University Hyderabad
